/ywg/ - Yokai Watch General #16 Anonymous Post No. 125493110 [Report]

EVERY THREAD UNTIL YOU LIKE IT Edition

Previous Thread: >>125173949

>Is this actually good?

Yes it's good, just don't go in expecting the hyped up "Pokemon killer" aspect. They aren't the same game at all, just two games in the monster catching genre. If you want an explanation on the battle system, someone can fill you in, don't worry the demo was indeed shit.

>Is there a list of all the yokai?

http://yokaipedia.net/list-of-youkai/

Some aren't available until Yokai Watch 2, though. Use the wikia to find out.

>I'm too lazy to look for i-

http://yokaiwatch.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page

We're actually working on sprucing this baby up. Feel free to contribute!

Here's a resource bin including detailed maps, Yokai locations, warp locations, evolution and fusion lists:

http://pastebin.com/kTfAcURn

>>

Even with ski masks my attackers get targeted by the kuro oni special attack. Is there no way to avoid it? I have to use a max hp powder to revive them because otherwise they get targeted again instantly too.

>>

Anonymous

[Report] Image search: [Google]

File: 1430362070224.gif (751 KB, 500x281) Image search: [Google]

751 KB, 500x281

>>125543645

Ski masks have them avoid all basic attacks, not soultimates, which can still hit anyone. The best way around it i think is to charge your tank's soutlimate but not activate it. Leave it inactivated for use again when the Oni does their soultimate again. The Oni's target prioritizes anyone charging a soultimate so even their own soultimate will go for the one charging.

Sticker of hate has greater priority however, and the Oni will always target the person with it, even with their Soultimate and even if one of your other youkai does a soultimate. It's a bit of a give and take between the sticker and ski masks. A tank with a sticker can draw any and all single target attacks but at the cost of lowered defense, freeing up your other youkai to have other items besides ski masks. Conversely ski masks give your tank the ability to wear a nice defensive item at the cost of not avoiding soultimates normally and providing no other bonuses.

>>
